content: Loved my visit here, loads of great places to eat and a really interesting city to visit
Great city with lovely history. A vibrant food and drink scene as well
I did not enjoy here, it was too busy!
There were some nice areas in the city but it wasn't mind-blowing
Nice place to visit for the day and visited a lovely restaurant
Not sure why this place gets a bad name, great area with good shops and nightlife
Nothing to do here, was pretty boring
Was ok but nothing major happening here
Was nice to be by the seaside and the pier
